name: Trivia Tower: Getting Better Edition
description:
Trivia Tower: Getting Better Edition is a short, chill experience built for the MinnMax Game Jam 2022. Inspired by MinnMax's monthly Trivia Tower competition, you make your way through five floors of MinnMax-themed trivia, exploring each environment to find clues. To ascend each floor, you must correctly answer the questions posed by the floor's boss (or bosses). 

We did not design TT: GBE to be difficult, so just relax, take your time, and most importantly, have fun! We really hope you enjoy it :)

Controls:

Keyboard and mouse:

Move with WASD

Interact with [E]

Jump with [Space]

Crouch with [Ctrl]

Pause with [Esc]

Controller (support may be a little wonky!):

Move with analogue stick

Interact with [X]

Jump with [A]

Crouch with [B]

Pause with [Start]
